name: Nubicola
description:
COLLECT ALL FRUITS AND ESCAPE THE DEADLY FOREST

Tired of living from commission to commission, a boy decides to take on a bigger job so he won't have to worry about food for a couple of weeks. "Just collect a few fruits", he thought to himself, "it's that easy."

Features

  • Don't collect more than 5 apples!

WASD / Arrow Keys - Movement
Z / J - Jump/Interact
X/K - Run
Enter - Start

Credits

  • Alexandra Madeira
  • Diogo Nicolau
  • Rodrigo Soares

Please leave your feedback here.

This is a prototype, made for a school project with the help of the GB-Studio tool.
